en.accessibilityNote:
CommandPost makes use of the built-in macOS Accessibility Frameworks
to control other applications, such as Final Cut Pro.

To continue, please press Allow Accessibility below and
follow the prompts to allow CommandPost accessibility access.

en.advancedFeaturesWarning:
The below options are hidden Final Cut Pro preferences.
If enabled, they'll remain enabled even if CommandPost is not running.
Trashing your Final Cut Pro preferences will reset these preferences too.
Please use with care, as there's a reason Apple hasn't exposed them.

en.badStreamDeckIcon: Only supported image files (JPEG, PNG, TIFF, GIF or BMP) are allowed as Stream Deck icons.
en.badTouchBarIcon: Only supported image files (JPEG, PNG, TIFF, GIF or BMP) are allowed as Touch Bar icons.
en.batchExportBackgroundTasksDetected:
Incomplete background tasks were detected, which has aborted the Batch Export.

Background tasks can be ignored via the Batch Export Preferences if required.
en.batchExportComplete:
Batch Export is now complete.

The selected clips have been added to your Final Cut Pro export queue.
en.batchExportCompressorComplete:
Batch Export is now complete.

The selected clips have been added to your Compressor Batch ready for processing.
en.batchExportDestinationDisabled:
The Target destination you have selected is disabled in the menubar, which has aborted the Batch Export.

Please try again.
en.batchExportInvalidCaptionsDetected:
Captions or subtitles with unresolved validation errors were detected, which has aborted the Batch Export.

Invalid Captions can be ignored via the Batch Export Preferences if required.
en.batchExportMissingFilesAndBadCaptionsDet:
Missing or offline titles, effects or generators as well as captions or subtitles with unresolved validation errors were detected, which has aborted the Batch Export.

Missing & Offline Effects and Invalid Captions can be ignored via the Batch Export Preferences if required.
en.batchExportMissingFilesDetected:
Missing or offline titles, effects or generators were detected, which has aborted the Batch Export.

Missing & Offline Effects can be ignored via the Batch Export Preferences if required.
en.batchExportNoDestination:
It doesn't look like you have a Default Destination selected.

You can set a Default Destination by going to 'Preferences', clicking the 'Destinations' tab, right-clicking on the Destination you would like to use and then click 'Make Default'.

You can set a Batch Export Destination Preset via the CommandPost menubar.
en.batchExportNotShowing:
Unable to show the Export Dialog, which has aborted the Batch Export.

Please try again.
en.batchExportProxyFilesDetected:
Proxy files were detected, which has aborted the Batch Export.

Proxy files can be ignored via the Batch Export Preferences if required.
en.batchExportUnexpectedAlert:
An unexpected alert appeared while opening the Export dialog.

Please try again.
en.batchRenameBrowserFail:
The Batch Rename tool could not open the Browser.

Please open the Browser and try again.

en.pasteboardToMarkers_title: Paste Markers to Selected Clip in Browser from Pasteboard
en.pasteboardToMarkersCompleted: Copying Pasteboard Markers to Selected Clip in Browser has completed successfully.
en.pasteboardToMarkersFailed:
The pasteboard doesn't contain any text in the required format to process.

You should use the following syntax:

05:00:00: Test Keyword 1
#05:01:00:01: Test Keyword 2
*05:02:00: Test Keyword 3
05:02:15: Test Keyword 4
*05:03:00: Test Keyword 5
05:03:15: Test Keyword 6
#05:03:30: Test Keyword 7
*05:04:00: Test Keyword 8

If a * is place before the timecode, it will make the clip as a favourite between the current timecode value and the next timecode value.

If a # is place before the timecode, it will create a 'To Do' marker.

en.scanFinalCutProSetupOne: CommandPost needs to scan your system for Final Cut Pro Plugins & Motion Templates.
en.scanFinalCutProSetupTwo: Depending on how many plugins and effects you have installed, this can take several minutes.
en.screenRecordingNote:
CommandPost requires Screen Recording permission on macOS Catalina to detect the state of various user interface elements - for example, to detect when Final Cut Pro is playing or stopped. We also allow users to optionally share screenshots when submitting feedback.

To continue, please press Allow Screen Recording, which will open System Preferences allowing you to grant CommandPost Screen Recording permission. CommandPost will automatically restart once granted permission.
en.scrubTimelineDescription: Allows you to move the playhead one frame left or right.
en.searchAbortedDescription:
The search failed to find anything after searching 500 cells, so we've aborted it.

You can try using a Smart Collection or use the 'Filter Browser Before Search' option in the HUD Search Panel to narrow your selection in the Browser.
en.selectAFolderToSaveCSV: Please select a folder to save the CSV to
en.selectedClipDoesntOfferAnyTextAlignmentO: The selected clip doesn't offer any Text Alignment options.

en.setIncrementalNumberError: This value looks incorrect. Please enter a number and try again.
en.setIncrementalNumberMessage: What would you like to set the Incremental Number to?
en.settingsDescription:
In a future release of CommandPost we will have a proper import/export feature for settings.
In the meantime you can manually copy and paste settings between machines via Finder.
You can also setup a sym-link so that the settings folder points to a Dropbox or iCloud Drive folder allowing you to share settings between machines.
en.sharedPasteboardPathMissing: The Shared Pasteboard path no longer exists. Would you like to select a new location?
en.shortcutAlreadyInUse: This shortcut is already in use.
en.shortcutAlreadyInUseByMacOS: This shortcut combination is currently in use by macOS (i.e. it could be used by Screen Capture, Universal Access, and Keyboard Navigation keys).
en.shortcutCouldNotBeTriggered:
This shortcut could not be triggered.

Please check that you valid shortcut keys assigned to command you've tried to trigger in the Final Cut Pro Command Editor and try again.
en.shortcutDuplicateError: You cannot use the same shortcut for multiple commands.
en.shortcutPleaseTryAgain: Please select a new key and/or modifier combination and try again.
en.shortcutsResetConfirmation: This will reset all modified shortcuts to the default values.
en.shortcutsSetNoneConfirmation: This will reset all of the shortcuts to None.
en.snippetAlreadyExists: A Snippet with this name already exists.
en.snippetEnterLabel: Please enter a unique label for the snippet:
en.snippetError: The following error occurred when executing this snippet
en.snippetExecuteError: The Snippet could not be executed successfully.
en.snippetsDescription:
Code Snippets are simple Lua scripts, that can be easily thrown together, shared around, and triggered via actions.
For example, a snippet can be triggered via the Search Console. This allows you to quickly code things without creating a plugin.
en.snippetUniqueName: Please enter a new unique label and try again.
en.streamDeckAppRunningMessage: This must be closed to activate Stream Deck support in CommandPost.
en.streamDeckAppTip: The official Stream Deck application is not compatible with CommandPost and can't be used at the same time.

en.streamDeckResetGroupConfirmation: This will reset all the Stream Deck items in the current application to the default values.
en.streamDeckResetSubGroupConfirmation: This will reset all the Stream Deck items in the current bank to the default values.

en.tangentFavouriteDescription: You can assign any action in CommandPost to a Favourite below, which is then accessible in the Tangent Mapper.

There is no shortcut key applied to this command, so the command cannot be triggered.

Please open up the Final Cut Pro Command Editor and assign a shortcut key to the command, then try again.
en.tangentMapperNotFoundMessage:
The Tangent Mapper application could not be found.

Please download the latest version from the Tangent website and try again.
en.tangentPreferencesInfo: CommandPost offers native support of the entire range of Tangent's panels, including the Element, Wave & Wave2, Ripple, Arc, CP-200, the Element-Vs iPad & Android app, as well as any future panels that Tangent releases.

en.timelineBatchExportBeginMessage:
This Timeline Batch Export Tool uses automation to select each clip individually, then triggers the 'File > Share' menu item.

Please do not move the mouse or touch the keyboard until this process is complete.
en.timelineBatchExportCompressorBeginMessag:
This Timeline Batch Export Tool uses automation to select each clip individually, then triggers the 'File > Send to Compressor' menu item.

Please do not move the mouse or touch the keyboard until this process is complete.

en.touchBarDuplicateWidgetInfo: An individual Touch Bar widget can only be used once on your custom Touch Bar. Please select a different widget and try again, or remove the original instance of the widget.
en.touchBarError:
Virtual Touch Bar support requires macOS 10.12.1 (Build 16B2657) or later.

Please update macOS and try again.

en.touchBarResetGroupConfirmation: This will reset all the Touch Bar items in the current application to the default values.

en.touchBarSetupTip:
Make sure "App Controls with Control Strip" is selected within the "Touch Bar shows" Keyboard System Preferences to see the CommandPost icon.
You can then tap this icon to toggle through the different Touch Bar groups.
en.trimToggleDescription: Hold down MIDI button for Trim Tool, then release for Select Tool.
en.updateEffectsListFailed: Unfortunately the Effects List was not successfully updated.
en.useBetterQualityInAnglesViewer: Use Better Quality in Angles Viewer (requires restart)
en.watchFolderAddFinderTag: If you want to add a Finder Tag to any %{type} Files that are added to this Watch Folder please enter it below, or press OK to skip:
en.watchFolderCompressorHelp: This feature allows you to automatically transcode files with Compressor when they're added to any of the below Watch Folders.
en.watchFolderFCPMediaHelp:
This feature allows you to recieve macOS notfications whenever supported files are added into any of the below watch folders.
From the notification you can then Import these files directly to your current Final Cut Pro timeline.
If you hold down SHIFT when pressing Import, it will import all the outstanding files.
en.watchFolderFCPMediaTooltip: Final Cut Pro Media Watch Folder Preferences
en.watchFolderFCPXMLTooltip: Final Cut Pro XML Watch Folder Preferences
en.watchFolderXMLHelp:
This feature allows you to recieve macOS notfications whenever a FCPXML file is added into any of the below watch folders.
From the notification you can then Import these files directly to your current Final Cut Pro timeline.
If you hold down SHIFT when pressing Import, it will import all the outstanding files.
en.whatDidYouExpectToHappen: What did you expect to happen?
en.whatFeatures: What feature would you like to see implemented or improved?
en.whatStepsToRecreate: What are the steps to recreate the problem?
en.zoomSliderDescription: Allows you to control timeline zoom.
